trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for role-service settings.
trans-unit.target: 表示角色服务设置的配置节。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptingRoleServiceSection class enables you to programmatically access and modify the `roleService` element of the configuration section for using AJAX functionality in [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: ScriptingRoleServiceSection 类使你能够以编程方式访问和修改`roleService`使用中的 AJAX 功能的配置节的元素[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The role service is typically used to retrieve role information for the user who is logged on by using an asynchronous Web service call.
trans-unit.target: 角色服务通常用于检索其角色信息的用户的登录使用的异步的 Web 服务调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingRoleServiceSection"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the role service is enabled for an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] application that uses AJAX features.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为启用了角色服务[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]使用 AJAX 功能的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the role service is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用该角色服务;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
